item.description:
Organizer: William
Contact: Please use William's link
Target Audience: All photographers

For this Event we will need some people to Volunteer to drive. I will of course volunteer my car which holds 6 others. We will hit the streets of Boston and capture some of the city lights at night. Fanuel Hall, The Waterfront, Statehouse, Newbury Street, I was thinking of some shots of the bridge from the Garden T-stop which has a great shots of traffic heading north(for anyone interested in the ever so popular car contrails shot).

If anyone has any other places of interest please let me know. I will map out a route in the next few weeks. Also if anyone knows of a good place to get together after for some drinks/food please let us know..
item.name: City Streets - Boston at Night
